FuncDef: This command configures the maximum bytes to be transmitted before a key re-exchange is initiated by the server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of megabytes, on a SSH session, after which the SSH client initiates the key-re-exchange. Values-1 to 64000. ParamDefault: Default- 1024
Specifies that a session will never timeout. To re-enable mbytes, enter the command without the disable option.
